Summary: {dr}These are pictures from a trail camera set out to capture wild animals
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lairdsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThese are several pictures from a trail camera set up to capture wild game. The camera is facing a hill with no houses in the background. The first pictures are night pictures of odd lights. The last two show the area during the day. The last two pictures show some sort of object in the air during the day. I am unsure what that is as well. I have more pictures if needed from the first group.
